    Action Items:

    - Emma to update the project plan based on the client''s feedback.

    - David to coordinate with the development team to start the initial phase.

    - Schedule the next meeting for June 1, 2024.

    '

args.subject: Summary of the client meeting
args.body:
Dear John,

I hope this email finds you well.

Please find attached the minutes from our recent meeting held on May 5, 2024. Below is a brief summary of the main points discussed:

- We reviewed and discussed the client requirements for the new project.
- The project timeline and key milestones were agreed upon.
- Initial design concepts were reviewed, and valuable feedback was gathered.

Action Items:
- I will update the project plan based on your feedback.
- David will coordinate with the development team to kickstart the initial phase.

Please take note of our next meeting scheduled for June 1, 2024.

Feel free to reach out if you have any questions or need further clarifications.

Best regards,
Emma Johnson
Blue Sparrow Tech
